name: Bewear
author: Saya Tsuruta
flavor_text: This immensely dangerous Pokémon possesses overwhelming physical strength. Its habitat is generally off-limits.

abilities.name: Fluffy
abilities.effect: This Pokémon takes 30 less damage from the attacks of your opponent’s non-{R} Pokémon (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Cross-Cut
attacks.effect: If your opponent’s Active Pokémon is an Evolution Pokémon, this attack does 60 more damage.
